subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A non-drinking water service must be in accordance with AS/NZS 3500.1, subject to the following:

ol.li: Substitute the text of clause 9.7.1(a) as follows: (a) be of a type that has a removable handle.
Substitute the text of clause 9.7.1(c) as follows: (c) have a non-standard inlet connecting thread and a standard hose connection outlet.
